document_data.caption: Luna sinks into the ground.
document_data.name: Sink
document_data.mainbody: '''''Sink''''' was a powerful [[spell]] that could cause an opponent to sink into the ground, rendering it unable to move.
document_data.History:
The spell was developed by [[Netheril|Netherese]] [[arcanist]] [[Valdick]] in [[-1852 DR|2007 NY (−1852 DR)]] and was originally called '''''Valdick's submerse'''''.

Originally usable only arcanists and wizards, by [[1370 DR]] it was known to the [[specialty priest]]s of the [[Mulhorandi pantheon|Mulhorandi god]] [[Geb]].
document_data.Notable Uses: During the [[Time of Troubles]] of [[1358 DR]], [[Luna]] confronted the [[Shar|false avatar]] of [[Selûne]], but she cast ''sink'' and caused her to fall into the ground. Luna escaped with a ''[[blink]]'' spell.{{Cite comic/Selune Rising|20}}
